segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen scene, and it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is just pouring over the sink's edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a really wide puddle around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice she's standing in water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains so utterly neutral, it's unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, over by the cabinets, the children are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool the boy is on looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted back, almost as if it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high for those cookies, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just picture him falling backward onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought makes my stomach clench a little.
segments.speaker: PAR
